snippet.title: Layers of Fear: Masterpiece Edition - Scare Trailer
snippet.description:
Layers of Fear: Masterpiece Edition includes both Layers of Fear and its Inheritance DLC in a single, horror-filled package.

Layers of Fear can be a little... intense. Have you played it yet?

Get it on Steam - http://bit.ly/LOFME-Steam
Get it on Xbox One - http://bit.ly/LOFME-Xbox
Get it on PS4 - http://bit.ly/LOFME-PS4

Learn more at http://www.layersoffear.com
